feed.title: cpprefjp - C++日本語リファレンス

entry.title: 定数式での`dynamic_cast`、多態的な`typeid`を許可 [P1327R1] -- リンク切れを修正 #1454
entry.summary:
diff --git a/lang/cpp20/allowing_dynamic_cast_polymorphic_typeid_in_constant_expressions.md b/lang/cpp20/allowing_dynamic_cast_polymorphic_typeid_in_constant_expressions.md
index 723cff331..309c3d4fd 100644
--- a/lang/cpp20/allowing_dynamic_cast_polymorphic_typeid_in_constant_expressions.md
+++ b/lang/cpp20/allowing_dynamic_cast_polymorphic_typeid_in_constant_expressions.md
@@ -111,4 +111,3 @@ false
 
 - [P1327R1 Allowing dynamic_cast, polymorphic typeid in Constant Expressions](http://www.open-std.org/jtc1/sc22/wg21/docs/papers/2018/p1327r1.html)
 - [P1328R0 Making std::type_info::operator== constexpr](https://wg21.link/P1328)
-- [P1328 Making std::type_info::operator== constexpr - cplusplus/papers](https://github.com/cplusplus/papers/issues/70)
\ No newline at end of file

entry.title: as_awaitable -- typo修正とNGワード追加
entry.summary:
diff --git a/reference/execution/execution/as_awaitable.md b/reference/execution/execution/as_awaitable.md
index 9b758ed05..9ed3e1381 100644
--- a/reference/execution/execution/as_awaitable.md
+++ b/reference/execution/execution/as_awaitable.md
@@ -120,7 +120,7 @@ struct awaitable-receiver {
 * coroutine_handle[link /reference/coroutine/coroutine_handle.md]
 * see below[italic]
 
-説明用の式`rcvr`を`awaitable-reciever`型の右辺値、`crcvr`を`rcvr`をconst参照する左辺値、`vs`を式パック、`err`を`Err`型の式とする。このとき
+説明用の式`rcvr`を`awaitable-receiver`型の右辺値、`crcvr`を`rcvr`をconst参照する左辺値、`vs`を式パック、`err`を`Err`型の式とする。このとき
 
 - [`constructible_from`](/reference/concepts/constructible_from.md)`<result-type, decltype((vs))...>`を満たすとき、式[`set_value`](set_value.md)`(rcvr, vs...)`は下記と等価。そうでなければ、式`set_value(rcvr, vs...)`は不適格となる。

entry.title: split -- typo修正とNGワード追加
entry.summary:
diff --git a/reference/execution/execution/split.md b/reference/execution/execution/split.md
index 3117c5e3b..06a180de1 100644
--- a/reference/execution/execution/split.md
+++ b/reference/execution/execution/split.md
@@ -301,7 +301,7 @@ explicit shared-state(Sndr&& sndr);
 void start-op() noexcept;
 ```
 
-- 効果 : `inc-ref()`を評価する。`stop_src.`[`stop_requested()`](/reference/stop_token/inplace_stop_source/stop_requested.md) `== ture`のとき`notify()`を評価する。そうでなければ、[`start`](start.md)`(op_state)`を評価する。
+- 効果 : `inc-ref()`を評価する。`stop_src.`[`stop_requested()`](/reference/stop_token/inplace_stop_source/stop_requested.md) `== true`のとき`notify()`を評価する。そうでなければ、[`start`](start.md)`(op_state)`を評価する。
 
 ```cpp
 void notify() noexcept;

entry.title: projected_value_t -- iterator/projected_value_t: add inner link
entry.summary:
diff --git a/reference/iterator/projected_value_t.md b/reference/iterator/projected_value_t.md
index 241752afb..700435a98 100644
--- a/reference/iterator/projected_value_t.md
+++ b/reference/iterator/projected_value_t.md
@@ -12,7 +12,7 @@ namespace std {
 }
 ```
 * indirectly_readable[link /reference/iterator/indirectly_readable.md]
-* indirectly_regular_unary_invocable[link /reference/iterator/indirectly_regular_unary_invocable.md.nolink]
+* indirectly_regular_unary_invocable[link /reference/iterator/indirectly_unary_invocable.md]
 
 ## 概要
 イテレータ型`I`が指す値型を取得する。

entry.title: inplace_stop_callback -- stop_token: fix inner links
entry.summary:
diff --git a/reference/stop_token/inplace_stop_callback.md b/reference/stop_token/inplace_stop_callback.md
index b66c5b516..32794afac 100644
--- a/reference/stop_token/inplace_stop_callback.md
+++ b/reference/stop_token/inplace_stop_callback.md
@@ -16,7 +16,7 @@ namespace std {
 
 
 ## 適格要件
-テンプレート引数`CallbackFn`が[`invocable`](/reference/concepts/invokable.md.nolink)および[`destructible`](/reference/concepts/destructible.md)を満たすこと。
+テンプレート引数`CallbackFn`が[`invocable`](/reference/concepts/invocable.md)および[`destructible`](/reference/concepts/destructible.md)を満たすこと。
 
 
 ## メンバ関数
